{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pdaIterB|formula=pdaIterA-(recImindY*((1-pow(dragY,pdaIterA))*vGravRec*AY+pdaIterA*grav*C))/(recImindY*(grav*C-logdY*pow(dragY,pdaIterA)*vGravRec*AY))}}
{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pdaIterC|formula=pdaIterB-(recImindY*((1-pow(dragY,pdaIterB))*vGravRec*AY+pdaIterB*grav*C))/(recImindY*(grav*C-logdY*pow(dragY,pdaIterB)*vGravRec*AY))}} m ({{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=timeGround|formula=round(pdaIterC-(recImindY*((1-pow(dragY,pdaIterC))*vGravRec*AY+pdaIterC*grav*C))/(recImindY*(grav*C-logdY*pow(dragY,pdaIterC)*vGravRec*AY)))}} ticks)

| colspan="4" | ''Given a target coordinate and an initial speed, calculate the {{lc:{{{name|entity}}}}} launch angle to hit the target. {{Simplecalc-hideifzero|formula=ifless(pitchCond,1/1e5,1,0)|{{#ifeq: {{{name|}}} | Arrow | <br> | }}Target is hit after {{Simplecalc|type=plain|id=timeTarget|formula=round(log(1-pitchB/cos(pitchTarget))/logdH)}} ticks{{#ifeq: {{{name|}}} | Arrow | {{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=vxTarget|formula=-logdH*pow(dragH,timeTarget)*recImindH*speedTarget*cos(pitchTarget)*cos(yawTarget+pi/2)*AH}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=vyTarget|formula=recImindY*(grav*C-logdY*pow(dragY,timeTarget)*(speedTarget*sin(pitchTarget)-grav*recImindY*B)*AY)}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=vzTarget|formula=-logdH*pow(dragH,timeTarget)*recImindH*speedTarget*cos(pitchTarget)*sin(yawTarget+pi/2)*AH}}&nbsp;and would deal {{Simplecalc-hideifzero|formula=crit|avg.}} {{Simplecalc|id=dmgTarget|type=plain|formula=if(crit,5/4*round(speedTarget*dmgTag)+1,round(speedTarget*dmgTag))|default=6.00|size=6|decimals=2}} <span class{{=}}"nowrap mc-hearts">{{healthbar|2|9}}&#32;× {{Simplecalc|id=dmgTargetHeart|type=plain|formula=dmgTarget/2|default=3}}</span> damage }}.}}''

| style{{=}}"white-space: nowrap;" | {{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchA|formula=AY*recImindY}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchB|formula=if(and(ifless(abs(abs(yawTarget)-pi/2),1/1e10,1,0),ifless(abs(dX),1/1e10,1,0)),abs(dZ)/(AH*speedTarget*recImindH),dX/(AH*speedTarget*cos(yawTarget)*recImindH))}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchC|formula=logdY/logdH}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchD|formula=B*grav*recImindY}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchE|formula=C*grav*recImindY/logdH}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=euler|formula=exp(1)}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchInitA|formula=-pitchA*(speedTarget-pitchD)*pitchC/pitchE*exp(pitchC*(dY-pitchA*(speedTarget-pitchD))/pitchE)}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchInitB|formula=pow(2/euler*(pitchInitA+1/euler),0.5)}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchInitC|formula=pitchInitA/(1/euler+pitchInitB*pow(1+euler/3*pitchInitB,0.5))}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchInit|formula=if(direct,asin(dY/pow(dX*dX+dY*dY+dZ*dZ,0.5)),acos(pitchB/(1-pow(-pitchE/(pitchA*(speedTarget-pitchD)*pitchC)*pitchInitC,1/pitchC))))}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchIterA|formula=pitchInit-(pitchA*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchInit),pitchC))*(speedTarget*sin(pitchInit)-pitchD)+pitchE*log(1-pitchB/cos(pitchInit))-dY)/(pitchA*speedTarget*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchInit),pitchC))*cos(pitchInit)-pitchE*pitchB*sin(pitchInit)/((1-pitchB/cos(pitchInit))*pow(cos(pitchInit),2))+pitchA*pitchB*pitchC*pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchInit),pitchC-1)*sin(pitchInit)*(speedTarget*sin(pitchInit)-pitchD)/pow(cos(pitchInit),2))}}
{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchIterB|formula=pitchIterA-(pitchA*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterA),pitchC))*(speedTarget*sin(pitchIterA)-pitchD)+pitchE*log(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterA))-dY)/(pitchA*speedTarget*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterA),pitchC))*cos(pitchIterA)-pitchE*pitchB*sin(pitchIterA)/((1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterA))*pow(cos(pitchIterA),2))+pitchA*pitchB*pitchC*pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterA),pitchC-1)*sin(pitchIterA)*(speedTarget*sin(pitchIterA)-pitchD)/pow(cos(pitchIterA),2))}}
{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchIterC|formula=pitchIterB-(pitchA*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterB),pitchC))*(speedTarget*sin(pitchIterB)-pitchD)+pitchE*log(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterB))-dY)/(pitchA*speedTarget*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterB),pitchC))*cos(pitchIterB)-pitchE*pitchB*sin(pitchIterB)/((1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterB))*pow(cos(pitchIterB),2))+pitchA*pitchB*pitchC*pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterB),pitchC-1)*sin(pitchIterB)*(speedTarget*sin(pitchIterB)-pitchD)/pow(cos(pitchIterB),2))}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchIterD|formula=pitchIterC-(pitchA*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterC),pitchC))*(speedTarget*sin(pitchIterC)-pitchD)+pitchE*log(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterC))-dY)/(pitchA*speedTarget*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterC),pitchC))*cos(pitchIterC)-pitchE*pitchB*sin(pitchIterC)/((1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterC))*pow(cos(pitchIterC),2))+pitchA*pitchB*pitchC*pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterC),pitchC-1)*sin(pitchIterC)*(speedTarget*sin(pitchIterC)-pitchD)/pow(cos(pitchIterC),2))}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchIterE|formula=pitchIterD-(pitchA*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterD),pitchC))*(speedTarget*sin(pitchIterD)-pitchD)+pitchE*log(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterD))-dY)/(pitchA*speedTarget*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterD),pitchC))*cos(pitchIterD)-pitchE*pitchB*sin(pitchIterD)/((1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterD))*pow(cos(pitchIterD),2))+pitchA*pitchB*pitchC*pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterD),pitchC-1)*sin(pitchIterD)*(speedTarget*sin(pitchIterD)-pitchD)/pow(cos(pitchIterD),2))}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchIterF|formula=pitchIterE-(pitchA*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterE),pitchC))*(speedTarget*sin(pitchIterE)-pitchD)+pitchE*log(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterE))-dY)/(pitchA*speedTarget*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterE),pitchC))*cos(pitchIterE)-pitchE*pitchB*sin(pitchIterE)/((1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterE))*pow(cos(pitchIterE),2))+pitchA*pitchB*pitchC*pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterE),pitchC-1)*sin(pitchIterE)*(speedTarget*sin(pitchIterE)-pitchD)/pow(cos(pitchIterE),2))}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=pitchTarget|formula=pitchIterF-(pitchA*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterF),pitchC))*(speedTarget*sin(pitchIterF)-pitchD)+pitchE*log(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterF))-dY)/(pitchA*speedTarget*(1-pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterF),pitchC))*cos(pitchIterF)-pitchE*pitchB*sin(pitchIterF)/((1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterF))*pow(cos(pitchIterF),2))+pitchA*pitchB*pitchC*pow(1-pitchB/cos(pitchIterF),pitchC-1)*sin(pitchIterF)*(speedTarget*sin(pitchIterF)-pitchD)/pow(cos(pitchIterF),2))}}
